entry.value: library(ggplot2)%%00010library(ggrepel)%%00010%%00010df_out <- as.data.frame(res.pca$x)%%00010 condition <- rownames(df_out)%%00010 rownames(df_out) <- NULL%%00010 df_out <- cbind(condition,df_out)%%00010%%00010 # percentage <- round(res.pca$sdev / sum(res.pca$sdev) * 100, 2)%%00010%%00010%%00010%%00009eig <- (res.pca$sdev)^2%%00009 # Vlastni cisla%%00010%%00009variance <- round(eig*100/sum(eig), 2)%%00009 # % rozptylu popsaneho novymi osami%%00010%%00010%%00009percentage <- paste( colnames(df_out[2:length(df_out)]), "(", paste(as.character(variance), " %", ")", sep="") )%%00010%%00009%%00010%%00010p<-ggplot(df_out,aes(x=PC1,y=PC2, label = df_out$condition)) +%%00010%%00009ggtitle(paste(c('PCA plot \n PCA settings: remove missing values - ', toString(knime.flow.in[["nas_omit"]]==1), ', data standardize - ', toString(knime.flow.in[["standardize"]]==1)), collapse='')) +%%00010%%00010%%00009theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5, size=10, face='bold', margin(10,0,10,0)), legend.position="none",%%00010%%00009axis.text.x = element_text(size=10, vjust=0.5), axis.text.y = element_text(size=10, vjust=0.5), %%00010%%00009plot.margin = unit(c(1, 2, 1, 2), "cm"), %%00010%%00009axis.title.x = element_text(size=15), axis.title.y = element_text(size=15)) +%%00010%%00009geom_point(aes(color=condition),size=6) +%%00010%%00009geom_text_repel(size=3, show.legent=FALSE) +%%00010%%00009geom_hline(yintercept=0, linetype="dashed", color = "black") +%%00010%%00009geom_vline(xintercept=0, linetype="dashed", color = "black") +%%00010%%00009xlab(percentage[1]) + ylab(percentage[2])%%00010%%00009%%00010%%00010%%00010 plot(p)

entry.key: Output non numbers (NaN, Inf, -Inf) as missing cells
